participant_2.background:
I live in texas.
I spend a lot of time online.
I love to play on second life.
I am a furry.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love to play games online, especially Second Life.
Oh, I've heard of Second Life. Is it fun?
It's so much fun! You can create your own character and explore a virtual world with other people.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a great way to meet new people and have fun.
I'm glad you enjoy it. It sounds like something I'd really enjoy.
I'm sure you would! It's a great way to escape from the real world for a while.
I'm always looking for ways to escape from the real world.
Second Life is the perfect place for that. You can be whoever you want to be and do whatever you want to do.
That sounds amazing! I'm so glad I found out about it.
So, what do you do in Second Life?
I do a lot of things. I like to explore different areas, meet new people, and go on adventures.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm sure you've had some great experiences.
I have! I've met some really amazing people and had some really unforgettable experiences.
That's so great! I'm so glad you're enjoying Second Life.
I really am. It's a great place to be.
